name: Fix filter paths
body:
* Fix filter paths
Thanks @chakli

name: v4.9.1
body:
* Enables copying torrent details like path
* The path input of the add new torrent compares based on any sub string from path and not the beginning of the path (String.compare)

Thanks @chakli

name: v4.9.0
body:
* Fix details fragment "flickering"
* Fix download text view in tablet layout

Thanks David Hodges (@daveeeh)

name: v4.8.9
body:
* Encapsulate a static BuildURL method.
* Change default port number to -1 (just like local_port) and set to remove the ":" part of the URL if it is -1.
* Change a few instances where port is sent as part of header and modified those to take into account the new url string without the port number

Thanks @simplethemind

name: v4.8.8
body: Add force resume

name: v4.8.7
body:
* Remove F-Droid from README
* Remove ads space in Pro version
* Fix Progress, Size, ETA, and Download / Upload Speed comparators
* Remove Host and Referer headers

* Fix breaking bar top
* Add footer status bar

name: v4.8.5
body: * Fix content type header issues reported  (which can be related to reverse-proxies)

body:

* Fix host and referer params

* Add State (Category) in app title

name: v4.7.6
body: * Fix header formatting for lower resolution devices

name: v4.7.5
body:
* Add showing remaining free space on header bar
* Add uploaded and downloaded total for current session on header bar
* Add Torrent's total uploaded info in torrents list. This is a total for the torrent, not just for current session.
* Add total counters to menu drawer items
* Fix https self-sign certificate validations

name: v4.7.4
body:
* Add support for categories
* Fix upload speed in torrent's details

name: v4.7.3
body: * Add support for https

name: v4.7.2
body: * Add support for save path

name: v4.7.1
body:
* Add support for subfolder 
* Fix ratio formatting to n.nn
* Fix ratio comparator class

name: v4.7.0
body:
Upgrade to support qBittorrent 4.2.x  (4.1.x are supported as well). For older versions, use qBController v4.6.4. This release includes:

* List torrents
* Add torrents
* Delete torrents
* Delete torrents and data files
* Pause torrents
* Resume torrents
* Pause all torrents
* Resume all torrents
* Set torrent priority
* Force recheck
* Add Tracker
* Sequential download
* First and last pieces first

Not available on this release:

- Set rate limit
- RSS
- Options
- Categories
- Save path

name: v4.5.8
body: *  Fixed Host header according to RFC 2616

name: v4.5.7
body: *  Fixed Host header according to RFC 2616

name: v4.5.5
body: * Set Host header to hostname for subfolder case

name: v4.5.4
body:
* Added Host and Referer for subfolder case
* Changed upload and download order in torrent info to match with the upper bar info.

name: v4.5.3
body:
* Added  qBittorrent 3.3.13 compatibility (fixed CSRF in API requests)
* Added support for moving the app to SD cards
* Updated larger aspect ratio for new Android flagship devices
* Added delay  time before sending file to qBittorrent

name: v4.5.2
body:
- Fixed save path and label (category) behavior
- Improved handle of downloaded torrent files  
- Added handling of save path and labels from Add torrent link menu option
- Added enabling of save path and label (category) preference for API7+ (qBittorrent 3.3.1+)
- Added download url command for API7+ (qBittorrent 3.3.1+)
- Removed old way to get files from download list
- Removed debug messages

name: v4.5.1
body:
- Fixed Torrent details issue on Android 7.x
- Updated French, Italian, Hungarian and Japanese translations.

- Added French translation (thanks Arnaud Guenee)

- Added enable/disable of save path and label dialog box.

- Fixed Labels not working on qBittorrent server v3.3.5

body:
- Added Hungarian translation

name: v4.3.2
body:
- Changed app short name to qBController
- Added sort by "Added on" and " Completed on"
- Added Storage permission request in BKS keystore file picker for Android 6+
- Updated Basque and Japanese translations
- Fixed annoying authentication message at startup.

- Fixed sorting by priority issue (torrents with zero priority)

body: - Fixed crash in devices with Android 4.4 and lower

name: v4.2.9
body:
- Added Seeding menu
- Added support for self-signed certificates

- Revamped the Options menu

body:
_Changelog_

body:

name: v4.2.4
body:

- Fixed search bar to perform searches using a persistent filter
- Added recognition of error state for icon in details and torrent list
- Changed license to LGPL v3.0 (GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0), in order to be compatible with Google libraries

body:

- Fixed wrong status shown when opening from completed notifications
- Fixed minor authentication issues 
- Change Basque translation (Transifex)

name: v4.2.2
body:
- Added option to change file priority, (now you can define what files to download first)
- Added filter to RSS feeds. Filter by a simple string or using a Regex
- Fixed issues with semicolon character in RSS feed url
- Fixed issues when sorting by Ratio in old qBittorrent versions
- Fixed wrong Completed title when opening the completed notification
- Removed unused permission READ_PHONE_STATE

- Added upload/download speeds and totals

name: v3.6.1
body:

- Added filters for torrent list (all, downloading, completed, active, inactive) for better performance on qBittorrent 3.2.x
- Added toggle sequential download and first last pieces download first function

- Fixed Files/Trackers height issue

- Added saving of last state
- Changed home screen icons to suit dark theme

_Changelog_
- Added multi choice of torrent in list. Now you can start, pause, and delete several torrents at the same time from the torrent list.
- Remove unnecessary "Refreshing" message. The progress bar indicator it's enough.
- Fixed not refresh after delete torrents and torrents with data (multi choice)

name: v2.2.0
body:
_Changelog_
- Added subfolder support for servers published at subfolder webservers (Thanks to Marcelo Origoni for reporting the issue and lending me his qBittorrent server)
- Improved retrival of torrents list and torrent's detail data
- Added auto refresh of torrent list. Defaul value: every 2 minute.
- Added ratio in torrent list
- Improved refresh after actions, according the action to perform.
- Added ETA, download and upload speed in torrent's details
- Increased timeouts values to qBittorrent servers
- Fixed Spanish and English messages

- Added "(KiB/s)" units in upload and download dialogs
